DOC.brief_title: Bone Marrow Micrometastases Patients With Early Stage Breast Cancer
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : 1 . Patients 18 year old give informed consent enter study . 2 . ASA III patient 3 . Patients diagnose breast cancer receive type treatment regard breast cancer time study 4 . Patients appropriate bone marrow biopsy 5 . Menopausal status relevant . Exclusion criterion : 1 . Active collagen tissue disorder 2 . Patients diagnose breast cancer receive type treatment regard breast cancer time study 3 . Pregnancy 4 . Patients bleed disorder , receive antiaggregant anticoagulant medication . 5 . Patients refuse enter study protocol refuse give inform consent .
